name: Four Letter Word Game
description:
The Four Letter Word Game is the classic change one letter at a time until you can’t find the next word. You can choose to play with 3, 4 or 5 letter words, and you can play in groups of up to 8 (using bluetooth or WiFi) or against the computer.

You can agree to add new words if they are not already in the dictionary, and you will start with three lives, which you can use to pass, or get a hint from the possible answers. When you have used up all of your lives, you are out!
